pages.text: Title: Observations on the Advantages to Be Derived from Increased Accommodation for the Insane; on the Beneficial Effects That Would Attend a More Extended Application of Moral Treatment; and on the Probable Cause of the High Rate of Mortality in Almost All County Asylums
